raw_body: called to rest. Beloved husband of Renuka, loving father of Ruwanmali, father-in-law of Jared, brother of Sandra, Shyama and Suresh. Remains lie at the Pradeshiya Sabha Funeral Parlour, Cemetery Road, Kerawalapitiya, Hendala from 10 a.m. (Tuesday), 9th April and the cortege leaves the Parlour on 10th April (Wednesday) at 3.00 p.m. for burial at the RC Section, Madampitiya Cemetery, Colombo 14
